entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
